page.title: 12A child's typical day
page.content: Normally I get up at 7.42am and go downstairs for breakfast. I have Frosties and some orange juice. At 8.15 I go upstairs and get washed and dressed. Then I make my bed. At 8.40 I combe my hair and set off for school. I get to school at 8.55 and play until the whistle goes at 9. When I get to into the school, if it is Monday or Thursday we go down to the Church Hall for PE. After we have come back we do some work until play. At 12 we have dinner. At 3.20 we go home. When I get home if it is a nice day I go outside and play tennis or football. Sometimes I go into the garden and help Mum with some gardening. At about 5.15 I go indoors and have tea. At 6 I go upstairs for a bath or shower. At night I go to bed at 8.30 or 9.
